tweet:
added an interactive build diary to the community page. transparency means seeing the messy parts too.

also remapped upstream 429s to 502s. if the provider is choked, that's a bad gateway, not you spamming. clarity helps.
alt_tweet:
shipped a tier cost simulation dashboard. trying to model the economics of generous free tiers without breaking the bank.

also: upstream rate limits (429) now return 502. it's not you, it's them.
image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene. The cute bee mascot and chunky robot analyzing a glowing vertical timeline of code commits on a large retro monitor. Lime green (#ecf874) highlights on the screen. Soft pastel gradient background. Pixel text: 'BUILD LOG'. Warm lighting, energetic composition, Stardew Valley vibes.
reasoning: Highlights the visible community feature (diary) and explains a technical change (error codes) in a way that benefits the user (less confusion).
